mapper.insert: insert into career (id, ctime, empid, entid, depid, stime, etime, occid, attendance, performance) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{ctime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{empid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{entid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{depid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{stime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{etime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{occid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{attendance,jdbcType=REAL}, #{performance,jdbcType=REAL})
mapper.update: update career set ctime = #{ctime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, empid = #{empid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, entid = #{entid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, depid = #{depid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, stime = #{stime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, etime = #{etime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, occid = #{occid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, attendance = #{attendance,jdbcType=REAL}, performance = #{performance,jdbcType=REAL} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, ctime, empid, entid, depid, stime, etime, occid, attendance, performance from career
select * from career where empid = #{empid} order by id desc limit 1;
